title: ‘Criminalising journalism’: Famous Salvadoran outlet to relocate
description: The Salvadoran news outlet El Faro says the Bukele government has attacked the country's press and eroded rule of law.

title: Argentinians buckle under 104.3 percent inflation
description: One of the highest rates in the world is straining wallets putting pressure on government ahead of October elections.

title: Brazil judge orders Bolsonaro to testify about capital attack
description: Supreme Court justice's order is part of probe into January 8 riots that saw Bolsonaro supporters storm gov't buildings.

title: What happens next in the Dominion lawsuit against Fox News?
description: Opening statements for the trial begin Monday, with Dominion saying that Fox deliberately spread false election claims.

title: Tunisian footballer dies after setting himself on fire in protest

title: French court approves Macron’s plan to raise retirement age
description: The Constitutional Council decides in favour of key provisions of French president's pension reforms.

title: JPMorgan Chase profits jump 52% amid banking turmoil

title: US targets El Chapo sons, Chinese workers in sweeping drug action

title: Biden admin asks US Supreme Court to halt abortion pill curbs

title: Spanish climber leaves cave after 500 days in isolation

title: Americans cut spending at retail stores in March
description: Sales fell among most retailers adding to other recent evidence that economy is cooling on back of high interest rates.

title: Russia’s Pacific Fleet put on high alert for snap drills

title: Arab nations discuss Syria return to Arab League in Saudi Arabia
description: Discussions among regional foreign ministers in Jeddah will include Syria's suspension from the Arab League.

title: In Malawi, female fish traders mobilise against transactional sex

title: Algeria parliament approves law tightening control over the media

title: AI could cause ‘nuclear-level’ catastrophe, third of experts say

title: How India will overtake China to become the most populous country

title: How China’s Xinjiang fuels Indonesia’s deforestation scourge
description: Chinese demand for Indonesian wood pulp is propping up industry ostracised elsewhere over sustainability concerns.
